医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究显示科罗拉多州限制价格后胰岛素成本显着下降糖尿病影响着数百万美国人，每年诊断出 140 万新病例。这种慢性病是美国的主要原因之一，每年造成的医疗费用超过 3200 亿美元。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Study-shows-significant-drop-in-insulin-costs-after-colorado-caps-prices.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Study-shows-significant-drop-in-insulin-costs-after-colorado-caps-prices.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3877a35b-035d-4a10-a725-e15b9c9a7333 Mon, 09 Sep 2024 15:56:39 -0400 Study shows significant drop in insulin costs after colorado caps prices
研究证实携带 BRCA 突变的乳腺癌幸存者母乳喂养是安全的根据在 2024 年 ESMO 大会上发表的两项国际研究，接受乳腺癌治疗后进行母乳喂养的女性，包括那些患有种系 BRCA 突变（BRCA 基因的遗传性变化，会显着增加患某些癌症，尤其是乳腺癌）的女性，不会面临复发或发展新乳腺癌的风险增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Research-confirms-safety-of-breastfeeding-for-breast-cancer-survivors-with-BRCA-mutations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Research-confirms-safety-of-breastfeeding-for-breast-cancer-survivors-with-BRCA-mutations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c9114efd-a8cd-49fd-bb9c-f60b3e87447e Mon, 09 Sep 2024 15:50:32 -0400 Research confirms safety of breastfeeding for breast cancer survivors with BRCA mutations
无细胞 RNA 分析增强了儿科炎症的早期检测RNA 通过细胞死亡或主动释放从细胞中排出，然后进入血浆。康奈尔大学领导的一项合作开发了机器学习模型，利用这些无细胞分子 RNA 残渣来诊断难以区分的儿科炎​​症状况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Cell-free-RNA-analysis-enhances-early-detection-of-pediatric-lingual-conditions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Cell-free-RNA-analysis-enhances-early-detection-of-pediatric-lingual-conditions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=83611f7a-7ea0-4c53-adf5-01bfe8e43ad6 Mon, 09 Sep 2024 15:40:07 -0400 Cell-free RNA analysis enhances early detection of pediatric inflammatory conditions
研究发现，大流行加速青少年大脑成熟在 COVID-19 大流行期间，世界各国政府实施了限制性措施 -；例如居家令和学校停课；以减轻呼吸道疾病的传播。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Pandemic-accelerates-brain-maturation-in-adolescents-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Pandemic-accelerates-brain-maturation-in-adolescents-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cff1f2cc-6822-4af7-9472-4e5b49c12277 Mon, 09 Sep 2024 15:31:06 -0400 Pandemic accelerates brain maturation in adolescents, study finds
KFF 健康新闻“健康是什么？”：来自奥斯汀的现场直播，审视健康公平“健康公平”一词对不同的人有不同的含义。这关系到获得医疗保健的机会，但不仅仅是获得医疗保健的机会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/KFF-Health-News-What-The-Health-Live-from-Austin-examining-health-equity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/KFF-Health-News-What-The-Health-Live-from-Austin-examining-health-equity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d1a06b6a-6000-4194-a80a-c275da0ce704 Mon, 09 Sep 2024 15:19:00 -0400 KFF Health News' 'What the Health?': Live from Austin, examining health equity
Sally Ross Soter 捐赠 1500 万美元以促进女性心脏健康心血管疾病是女性死亡的主要原因，而女性和男性之间在护理和获取服务方面仍然存在差距。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Sally-Ross-Soter-donates-2415-million-to-advance-womene28099s-heart-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Sally-Ross-Soter-donates-2415-million-to-advance-womene28099s-heart-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0a5c7259-299c-4ef8-89cf-796eb22d9c65 Mon, 09 Sep 2024 14:56:32 -0400 Sally Ross Soter donates $15 million to advance women’s heart health
研究人员发现了促进前列腺癌的机制密歇根大学健康罗格尔癌症中心的研究人员发现了一种典型的正常蛋白质出错并引发癌症的关键原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Researchers-uncover-mechanism-fueling-prostate-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Researchers-uncover-mechanism-fueling-prostate-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e70658da-2d2e-407e-aa45-336bbc8dad69 Mon, 09 Sep 2024 14:45:47 -0400 Researchers uncover mechanism fueling prostate cancer
患有慢性疼痛的年轻人更有可能出现临床焦虑或抑郁一项新的评论发现，患有慢性疼痛的年轻人患有临床焦虑或抑郁的可能性是同龄人的三倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Young-people-with-chronic-pain-more-likely-to-have-clinical-anxiety-or-depression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Young-people-with-chronic-pain-more-likely-to-have-clinical-anxiety-or-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=05b39035-585c-4528-a103-71600a832d42 Mon, 09 Sep 2024 14:40:03 -0400 Young people with chronic pain more likely to have clinical anxiety or depression
加州大学旧金山分校研究人员更接近预测婴儿猝死综合症加州大学旧金山分校的研究人员越来越接近能够预测婴儿猝死综合症（SIDS）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/UCSF-researchers-move-closer-to-predicting-sudden-infant-death-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/UCSF-researchers-move-closer-to-predicting-sudden-infant-death-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=80b6c657-fd4c-4734-b166-6e62ac4fa2cf Mon, 09 Sep 2024 14:27:56 -0400 UCSF researchers move closer to predicting sudden infant death syndrome
新的西班牙语网站旨在消除中风差异虽然中风是美国第五大死因，但它对西班牙裔人的影响尤为严重。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/New-Spanish-language-website-aims-to-combat-中风-disparities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/New-Spanish-language-website-aims-to-combat-中风-disparities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=df955bd9-08e8-4874-a090-4500efee05e1 Mon, 09 Sep 2024 14:16:08 -0400 New Spanish language website aims to combat stroke disparities
